sn2.10:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena suriyo devaputto rahuna asurindena gahito hoti.
sn2.10:1.3: Atha kho suriyo devaputto bhagavantam anussaramano tayam velayam imam gatham abhasi:
sn2.10:3.1: Atha kho bhagava suriyam devaputtam arabbha rahum asurindam gathahi ajjhabhasi:
sn2.10:6.1: Atha kho rahu asurindo suriyam devaputtam muncitva taramanarupo yena vepacitti asurindo tenupasankami; upasankamitva samviggo lomahatthajato ekamantam atthasi.
sn2.10:6.2: Ekamantam thitam kho rahum asurindam vepacitti asurindo gathaya ajjhabhasi:
